subject: Update to 2.5 release
commitMessage:
Update to 2.5 release

Some highlights of this release (and the previous release, 2.4):

* support for the Intel Haswell ULT CPU counters
* support for reporting of SATA DEVSLP in the alpm accounting patch
* RAPL support
* support for the Intel Baytrail-M CPU counters
* new "auto-tune" option which sets all tunable options to GOOD
* support for the 3.12 libtraceevent code base

Change-Id: I98c7578c0ac362a14c2ab52694df0da7ad2e6601
Signed-off-by: Patrick McCarty <patrick.mccarty@linux.intel.com>

subject: packaging: spec cleanups
commitMessage:
packaging: spec cleanups

- whitespace cleanups
- always use pkgconfig() in BuildRequires where possible
- create a docs subpackage for the man page
- fix RPM group tag

Change-Id: Ifa41e9f3a1bd0907a7c05e09dbf0dd1ae684de6f
Signed-off-by: Patrick McCarty <patrick.mccarty@linux.intel.com>
